text: wla tahmil nfs mdhnbt dhanb nfs akhra, wa'iin tasal nfs mthqalat balkhtaya man yahmil eanha min dhnwbha lm tajid min yahml eanha shyyana, walaw kan aldhy salth dha qurabat minha min 'ab 'aw 'akh wnhwhma. 'iinama thdhdhir -ayha alrswl- aladhin yakhafun eadhab rabihim balghyb, waddu alsalat haqa adayha. wamin tthr min alshirk wghyrh min almeasy fa'iinama ytthr lnfsh. wa'iilaa allah subhanah mal alkhlayq wmsyrhm, fyjazy kla bima ysthq
